attributes.action: To ensure that all MP's Spend at least 3 days in the house.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The People Elect MPs to represent them in government of the country, yet if you look at Parliment on TV, you rarely see MPs there. We don't pay them to just work out ways of how to get a expenses and conning the people to pay extra mortages.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
